snippet: ROTTER--Seymour, of White Plains passed away on April 22, 2016, at age 92. Beloved husband of Rita (nee Kriegel) Rotter, cherished father of Merrill (Laura), Chet (Jayne) and Annette (Joel Laitman) Rotter, loving grandfather of Clara, Elana, Ben, Natalie, Saul, Melanie, Olivia, Aaron and Eli and dear sister of Claire Cahn. He is also survived by many loving nieces and nephews. WWII Naval Officer, Professor of Political Science, Pension Consultant - a man of integrity, loyalty, modesty and unconditional devotion to family. A Funeral Service will be held 12pm Monday at Bet Am Shalom Synagogue in White plains, interment will follow at New Montefiore Cemetery. For more information: www.zionchapel.com 1/3
